title: patch 7.6 bug splats
body: ever since new patch came out i have been getting dced randomly from games. Bug splats 7 times or more in one game, its so frustrating getting time out ques for no reason.

replies.body:
Hmmmm if you've been getting bug splat's over and over after the patch, something may have gone wrong while you were downloading the latest patch. If the patching process messed up there could be some corrupted game files that are causing these crashes. 

Let's go over the [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to see if we can narrow down what's been causing these crashes.

i did all that i even reinstalled my windows and got a new ssd drive. i reinstalled the game 4 times and it still happens. i just got kicked mid game and it woudnt let me reconnect to the game but it allowed me to que up for a new game while i was already in a mid game. what the hell is going on.

Wow....that is hella weird o_o. The match you were trying to reconnect to may have voted to remake which would have let you q up for a different game....but that's still weird for sure xD.

Onto the matter at hand, since the bug splat guide wasn't able to find the root cause of your dc's, let's have you get a little more one on one troubleshooting with our tech team. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be better able to help!
